description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/01104/FUL (Erection of 2no. x new semi-detached dwellings with basements) to allow removal of both basements from the approved scheme.
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted.
